definition: to recruit talent/to round up/to enlist the services of sb
surname Yan
to prolong/to extend/to delay
to monopolize/to seize/to take into one's arms/to embrace/to fasten (with a rope etc)/to take on (responsibility etc)/to canvass

sentences.english: Talent introduction departments also actively went out visiting science and technology management talent.
sentences.chinese: 人才引进部门还积极走出去延揽科技管理人才。

sentences.english: Has the expected goal of recruitment been achieved?
sentences.chinese: 是否达到延揽预期目标？

sentences.english: Scientists and technicians were engaged and organised on a very large scale .
sentences.chinese: 在极为庞大的规模上延揽和组织科学家和技术人员。
